instructions.title: How to use Image to PDF Converter

steps.title: Upload your images
steps.description: Drag and drop multiple images into the upload area, or click to browse and select files from your computer. Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, and WebP formats.

steps.title: Reorder images
steps.description: Use the up/down arrow buttons to rearrange images in your desired order. The order determines how pages appear in the final PDF document.

steps.title: Configure PDF settings
steps.description: Click the settings icon to choose page size (A4, Letter, A3, etc.), fit mode (contain, cover, fill), margins, and output filename. Settings apply to all images.

steps.title: Generate and download PDF
steps.description: Click Generate PDF to create your document. Once complete, download the PDF file to your device. Each image becomes one page in the PDF.
